title: RP ADDTO: Functions
content: See also ~ idssxp by Thierry Arnoux.

blocks.name: elmapintab
blocks.content: Two ways to say a set is an element of mapped intersection of a class. Here ` F ` maps elements of ` C ` to elements of ` |^| { x | ph } ` or ` x ` . (Contributed by RP, 19-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elmapintab(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3)))))
  -| wb(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c0), cint(cab(s0, w0)))))
  -| wb(wcel(c0, c3), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c0), cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  3bitri(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3)))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c0), cint(cab(s0, w0)))), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c4, c0), cv(s0))))))
  anbi2i(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c0), cint(cab(s0, w0))), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c4, c0), cv(s0)))))
  elintab(s0, cfv(c4, c0), w0)
  fvex(c4, c0)
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, c2), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c4, c0), cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))))
  albidv(s0, wcel(c0, c2), wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c4, c0), cv(s0))), wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3)))
  imbi2d(wcel(c0, c2), w0, wcel(cfv(c4, c0), cv(s0)), wcel(c0, c3))
  baibr(wcel(c0, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c0), cv(s0)), wcel(c0, c3))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c4, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: fvnonrel
blocks.content: The function value of any class under a non-relation is empty. (Contributed by RP, 23-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvnonrel(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cfv(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), c1), emptycls)
} = {
  mpbi(wceq(cfv(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), c1), emptycls), wcel(cfv(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), c1), csn(emptycls)))
  eleqtri(cfv(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), c1), csn(emptycls), cun(crn(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)))), csn(emptycls)))
  fvrn0(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), c1)
  mpbi(wceq(cun(crn(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)))), csn(emptycls)), csn(emptycls)), wss(crn(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)))), csn(emptycls)))
  eqsstri(crn(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)))), csn(emptycls), emptycls)
  rnnonrel(c0)
  0ss(csn(emptycls))
  ssequn1(crn(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)))), csn(emptycls))
  elsn(cfv(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), c1), emptycls)
  fvex(cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0))), c1)
}

blocks.name: elinlem
blocks.content: Two ways to say a set is a member of an intersection. (Contributed by RP, 19-Aug-2020.)

blocks.name: elcnvcnvlem
blocks.content: Two ways to say a set is a member of the converse of the converse of a class. (Contributed by RP, 20-Aug-2020.)
